content: Hi all, I just pushed the latest 0.91.2 update for DSTU2. It contains mostly fixes to the .NET snapshot generator.
As well, I pushed an early alpha (0.93.0-alpha1) with the very latest STU3 materials to NuGet.
For the coming months, we'll use 0.91.x for DSTU2 releases, 0.92.x for DSTU2 on .NET core and 0.93.x for STU3.
Note that we will *not* abandon DSTU2 now STU3 has been published. We are trying to keep both versions feature-complete.
